content.text: Hi, I'm new here. What's your name?
Hi there, my name is participant_2. What's yours?
I'm participant_1. It's nice to meet you.
Nice to meet you too. What are you into?
I like to LARP, play video games, and listen to Pink Floyd.
LARP? That sounds interesting. I've never heard of it before.
LARP stands for Live Action Role Playing. It's a type of role playing game where you dress up as a character and act out a story.
That sounds like a lot of fun. Do you have to be good at acting to do it?
Not really. It's more about having fun and being creative.
That sounds like my kind of thing. I'll have to look into it.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Thanks for the recommendation. What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play a variety of games, but I mostly play RPGs and action games.
I'm a big fan of RPGs too. I love the story and character development.
Me too. I think that's what makes RPGs so great.
Yeah, they're really immersive.
What's your favorite game?
I have a few favorites, but one of my favorites is The Witcher 3.
That's a great game. I love the story and the world.
Yeah, it's really well done.
I've heard good things about the new DLC.
I haven't played it yet, but I'm looking forward to it.
Me too. I think it's going to be a lot of fun.
I'm sure it will be
